about_the_game:
Mexico has just ceded the California territory to the United States. When a miner is murdered after finding California gold, his spirit seeks to lead others to enact revenge. Every encounter along the way presents a unique challenge with multiple solutions. What will you do if an outlaw camp is in your path? Carefully sneak around, go in guns blazing, or lure a wild bear straight into their midst? This "western roguelite" allows you to choose a Wild West career, load up on supplies, and journey through a randomly generated west filled with glory and silly deaths

KEY FEATURES:

  • Be the Cowboy You Want - How will you make it west? Shoot everything in sight? sneak past dangerous enemies? Or live off the land and avoid combat all together?
  • Sneak, shoot, and stab your way through the Wild West with randomly generated environments like the forest, desert and mountains.
  • Unlock new hats and equipment to give a new strategy to your next attempt.
  • Manage your food, ammo, bandages, and more in your struggle to survive
  • Hours of game play, even in Alpha!
  • Get cholera, dysentery, broken limbs, and more!
  • Scavenge for supplies while you travel the west
  • Stop at towns to trade, take on missions, and resupply
  • Fight off outlaws
  • Bears, wolves, and other critters
  • A weather system and day night cycle
  • Dead for good! - Permadeath means when you eventually die, there's no coming back. The constant threat of death means every decision adds tension
  • Hilarious tombstones when you die




CONTROLS

(designed for XBOX controller!)

8 directional movement via dpad, joystick, or arrow keys. Automatically runs after a few steps

X button - use left hand item (keyboard z)
Y button - use right hand item (keyboard x)
A button - interact (keyboard c)
B Button - back

Shoulder L button - sneak ( keyboard shift)
Shoulder R button - Dash (keyboard alt)

Start - inventory (keyboard enter)
Select/back - exit game (keyboard escape)

short_description: Traveling west is dangerous, and you will die hilariously! Your choices of gear change your gameplay, and unlocking new equipment allows for new strategies! Scavenge for supplies, avoid wolves, and fend off outlaws. You could die of dysentery or bear attack, so be prepared for anything!
